rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a wheelchair accessible ramp. The space ensures open circulation for ease of movement.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall. Provides natural lighting and an open Mediterranean vibe.
Cozy dining space adjoining the living room with a view enhancing natural light. Designed for ease of movement.
Fully equipped kitchen with wheelchair-accessible design features. Complies with local building norms and Vastu principles.
Utility space for appliances with easy access to the kitchen. Includes a small pantry area.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with automatic doors.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Accessible balcony for additional light and air.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a walk-in closet and an attached bathroom. Designed for privacy and comfort.
Guest bedroom with a dedicated seating area. Incorporates Vastu principles for positive energy.
Multipurpose room that serves as a study or home office. Includes a small window for natural light.
Well-equipped bathroom with accessible design features. Includes grab bars and wide entrances.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase and adjoining ramp to ensure smooth vertical movement.

openings.location: All room façades on the first floor
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural lighting in bedrooms and study.
